message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $15,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly lower than what I'm willing to accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,500, but that's as high as I can go.
